headerDisplay: This Homebridge plugin uses Solax/QCells API cloud service to obtain real-time info of your inverters.

brand.title: Inverter Brand
brand.description: Brand for list of inverters below (API data fetch URL is brand dependent).

tokenId.title: TokenID
tokenId.description: Users get information from the cloud API through the granted tokenID. Please obtain your tokenID on the API page of Solax/QCells cloud.

hasBattery.title: Battery installed?
hasBattery.description: Whether this inverter has a battery installed.

pollingFrequency.title: Polling frequency (seconds)
pollingFrequency.description: Plugin data polling frequency from the cloud (in seconds).

smoothMeters.title: Add accessories for smooth meters?
smoothMeters.description: Enable this option to create accessories for smoothing raw values read from the cloud.

smoothingMethod.title: Smoothing method
smoothingMethod.description: Statistical method for smoothing power consumption data.

pureHomeApp.title: Add "pure" Home app accessories?
pureHomeApp.description: Enable this option to create light ambient sensors for power consumption.
